description: Convert the last term from decimal to binary!
references: C. Pickover, Mazes for the Mind, St. Martin's Press, NY, 1992, p. 350.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

extensions: Added a(1)=3. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 14 2015
